description.narrative: The project has two development objectives: (i) Prevent the groundwater contamination plume's further migration towards the residential areas, the city's sources of drinking water supply and eventually into the Irtysh River; and (ii) Strengthen institutional mechanisms for groundwater quality monitoring to enable control of ongoing groundwater pollution from local municipal and industrial sources.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, art. 2 | Description :Borrower shall establish Project Supervisory Council three monthsfrom effectiveness | Due Date :31-Jul-2010

title.narrative: Reduce level of heavy metals & other hazardous pollutants in groundwater, thereby reducing risk of contamination of city's soil & groundwater system, drinking water wells, & surface water of Irtysh.

baseline.value: Based on the detailed one year monitoring campaign, there were no exceedings of maximum allowable concentrations have been detectedat the Oktyabrskiy drinking water well nor the wells surrounding the well. Neither local Kazakhstan drinking water MaximumAllowable Concentrations (MACs), nor the MACs specified by the International Guidelines for drinking water quality (established bythe World Health Organization) thus, the groundwater in and near Oktyabrskiy well-field nowadays is not contaminated.

target.value: Level of heavy metals pollution in groundwater reduced to below international limits.

actual.value: No exceedings of maximum allowable concentrations have been detected near the drinking water well-field, neither local Kazakhstandrinking water Maximum Allowable Concentrations (MACs), nor the MACs specified by the International Guidelines for drinking waterquality (established by the World Health Organization) thus, the groundwater in Oktyabrskiy well-field nowadays is notcontaminated.The concentration of harmful substances in the groundwater is higher in the close proximity to the territory of theCentral Industrial Complex and reduces moving away from the Central Industrial Complex. This is is proven by results obtained from“Oskemen-Vodokanal” drinking water wells and the 4th group of monitoring wells.(which are further away from the Central IndustrialComplex)It was based on the detailed findings of the groundwater monitoring, that the groundwater pumping and treatment systemwas cancelled. The pollution in the groundwater and the migration of the pollution was not severe

title.narrative: Capacity of local institutions to implement and manage monitoring program has been increased.

target.value: Implementation of monitoring program is according to specifications.

actual.value: Regular monitoring program now underway and implementation of the monitoring program according to the specifications

title.narrative: Preventing further pollution of the local underground and aquifer through containment of identified high-risk waste dumps and slurry ponds located in the city area

baseline.value: No high risk waste dumps and slurry ponds identified for containment.

target.value: 7 identified high risk waste dumps and slurry ponds contained through stabilization, dewatering and covering.

actual.value: 5 identified high risk waste dumps and slurry ponds contained through stabilization, dewatering and covering. 1 identified highrisk waste dump for which containment and remediation works are completed for 80%. 1 identified high waste dump (radioactivehistoric Ulba Metturgical Plant waste dump nr 6) for which the contract award recommendation has been received but contract couldnot be signed due to insufficient construction time until project closure.

title.narrative: Eliminating pollution inflitration into the groundwater from these sites

target.value: Verification of effectiveness of the containment through technical inspections of the structures.

actual.value: Verification of effectiveness of the containment through technical inspections of the structures has been done.The technicalinspections were undertaken as part of the formal acceptance procedures for the completion of the remediation works for the fivedumps remediated.

title.narrative: Contaminated land managed or dump sites closed under the project
Groundwater quality monitoring system is established and functioning and local institutions are capable of sampling and sample analysis

baseline.value: No groundwater quality monitoring system established and functioning in local institutions

target.value: Groundwater quality monitoring system is established and functioning and local institutions are capable of sampling and sampleanalysis.

actual.value: Three (3) phases of long term groundwater monitoring program have been executed and relevant reports received. the Sampling hasbeen undertaken by local sampling company and the local drinking water company Vodokanal carried out all the sample analysis withtheir new laboratory which was rehabilitated under the Project to ensure that they could measure heavy metals and organic chemicalsin the lab to control the quality of drinking water and sewage in the city.Local institutions are capable of sampling analysisbased on new modern lab equipment and international training and joint execution first phases of groundwater monitoring program
